sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Style/Checkout.css'; const Checkout = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const { cartItems = [], username = 'Juxtopposed' } = location.state || {}; // Tính tổng giá trị đơn hàng const totalPrice = cartItems .map((item) => parseFloat(item.price.replace('$', '').replace('Free', '0')) || 0) .reduce((total, price) => total + price, 0); // Lấy ngày mua (hiện tại) const purchaseDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const handleReturnToStore = () => { navigate('/store'); }; return (
navigate("/store")}>
Wishlist navigate("/cart")}> Cart navigate("/profile")}> Profile

Payment Successful

Thank you for your purchase, {username}!

Order Summary:

{cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart was empty.

) : (
    {cartItems.map((item, index) => (
  • {item.name || 'Unknown Game'}
    ${item.price || '0.00'}
    • ))}
)}
{/* Thêm Ngày Mua */}

Purchase Date: {purchaseDate}

{/* Hiển thị Bank Account Number */}

Bank Account Number: 123-456-7890

Total Paid: ${totalPrice.toFixed(2)}

© 2023 Valve Corporation. All rights reserved.

All trademarks are property of their respective owners in the US and other countries.

VAT included in all prices where applicable.

  • About Valve
  • Jobs
  • Steamworks
  • Steam Distribution
  • Support
  • Privacy Policy
  • Legal
  • Steam Subscriber Agreement
  • Refunds
  • Cookies
); }; export default Checkout;
